nodes.text: The JX-09 Secured Prisoner Transport was a prisoner transport developed by Aratech Repulsor Company.

The JX-09 had a single pilot, four guards, and space for up to 20 passengers. It measured 14 meters in length, and was a long, insectile craft built around the chassis of a basic speeder truck, with four small wings for stabilization. Two flexible mandibles allowed the pilot and guards to remain inside while detaining particularly troublesome subjects.
